nodes.id: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

zh-cn: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 2016年中国两会期间，无界新闻网刊登要求时任中共中央总书记习近平辞职的公开信而引发的政治事件。
description.en: A political incident that occurred during China's Two Sessions in 2016, sparked by the publication of an open letter on Wujie News calling for the resignation of then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国最高领导人，是公开信要求辞职的对象。
description.en: Then General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who was the target of the open letter's demand for resignation.

description.zh-cn: 由无界传媒运营的新闻网站，因刊登《关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信》而成为事件的中心。
description.en: A news website operated by Wujie Media, which became the center of the incident for publishing the 'Open Letter Requesting Comrade Xi Jinping to Resign from Party and State Leadership Positions'.

nodes.id: 关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信

zh-cn: 关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信

description.zh-cn: 一篇以“忠诚的共产党员”名义发表、要求习近平辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信。
description.en: An open letter published in the name of 'loyal Communist Party members', demanding Xi Jinping's resignation from his party and state leadership positions.

zh-cn: 新疆无界文化传媒有限公司

description.zh-cn: 运营无界新闻的媒体公司，由财讯集团、新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府和阿里巴巴集团共同投资成立。
description.en: The media company that operated Wujie News, jointly invested and established by Caijing Group, the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region People's Government, and Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 无界传媒的投资方之一。
description.en: One of the investors in Wujie Media.

nodes.id: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 无界传媒的投资方之一。
description.en: One of the investors in Wujie Media.

description.zh-cn: 无界传媒的投资方之一，事件后提出将无界传媒清盘。
description.en: One of the investors in Wujie Media, which proposed to liquidate the company after the incident.

description.zh-cn: 一个中文新闻网站，被无界新闻标注为要求习近平辞职的公开信的来源。
description.en: A Chinese news website, cited by Wujie News as the source of the open letter demanding Xi Jinping's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 无界传媒董事长，因公开信事件被拘留调查。
description.en: Chairman of Wujie Media, who was detained for investigation in connection with the open letter incident.

description.zh-cn: 无界传媒执行总裁，因公开信事件被拘留调查。
description.en: CEO of Wujie Media, who was detained for investigation in connection with the open letter incident.

description.zh-cn: 无界新闻执行主编，因公开信事件被拘留调查。
description.en: Executive Editor of Wujie News, who was detained for investigation in connection with the open letter incident.

description.zh-cn: 无界新闻副主编，因公开信事件被拘留调查。
description.en: Deputy Editor of Wujie News, who was detained for investigation in connection with the open letter incident.

description.zh-cn: 媒体人，曾任《端传媒》评论部主编，因被认为与公开信事件有关而被带走调查。
description.en: Media professional and former editor at Initium Media's commentary section, who was taken away for investigation for his alleged connection to the open letter incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国异见人士，他声称其在中国的家人因公开信事件而被捕。
description.en: A Chinese dissident who claimed his family members in China were arrested in connection with the open letter incident.

description.zh-cn: 旅德时事评论员，他声称其家人因他对此事件发表评论而被带走。
description.en: A Germany-based current affairs commentator who claimed his family was taken away because of his comments on the incident.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府负责外交事务的部门，曾就此事件作出回应。
description.en: The department of the People's Republic of China government responsible for foreign affairs, which responded to this incident.

description.zh-cn: 一家媒体网站，在事件后曾刊登另一封要求罢免习近平的公开信。
description.en: A media website that published another open letter calling for Xi Jinping's removal after the incident.

nodes.id: 就立即罢免习近平同志党内外一切职务告全党、全军、全国人民书

zh-cn: 就立即罢免习近平同志党内外一切职务告全党、全军、全国人民书

description.zh-cn: 继《关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信》后，由《明镜新闻》刊登的另一封要求罢免习近平的公开信。
description.en: Following the 'Open Letter Requesting Comrade Xi Jinping to Resign from Party and State Leadership Positions', another open letter published by Mirror News calling for Xi Jinping's removal.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于香港的中文网络媒体，贾葭曾在此担任传媒评论部主编。
description.en: A Hong Kong-based Chinese-language online media outlet where Jia Jia once served as the editor of the commentary section.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会会议和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会会议的统称。要求习近平辞职的公开信在2016年两会期间发表，因此被视为敏感事件。
description.en: The collective term for the annual plenary sessions of the National People's Congress (NPC) and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC). The open letter demanding Xi Jinping's resignation was published during the 2016 Two Sessions, making it a sensitive event.

relationships.source: 财讯传媒

description.zh-cn: 财讯传媒是无界传媒的共同投资创立方之一。
description.en: Caijing Media is one of the co-founding investors of Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府是无界传媒的共同投资创立方之一。
description.en: The Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region People's Government is one of the co-founding investors of Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 阿里巴巴集团

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团是无界传媒的共同投资创立方之一。
description.en: Alibaba Group is one of the co-founding investors of Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 无界新闻

description.zh-cn: 无界新闻是由无界传媒举办和运营的新闻网站。
description.en: Wujie News is a news website organized and operated by Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 参与网
relationships.target: 关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信

description.zh-cn: 无界新闻刊登的公开信中标注来源为参与网。
description.en: The open letter published by Wujie News cited Canyu as its source.

relationships.source: 无界新闻
relationships.target: 关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信

description.zh-cn: 2016年3月4日，无界新闻刊登了《关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信》。
description.en: On March 4, 2016, Wujie News published the 'Open Letter Requesting Comrade Xi Jinping to Resign from Party and State Leadership Positions'.

relationships.source: 关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信
relationships.target: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 该公开信的发布直接引发了要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件。
description.en: The publication of this open letter directly triggered the incident.

relationships.source: 关于要求习近平同志辞去党和国家领导职务的公开信

description.zh-cn: 公开信以“忠诚的共产党员”名义，要求习近平辞去党和国家领导职务。
description.en: The open letter, in the name of 'loyal Communist Party members', demanded that Xi Jinping resign from his party and state leadership positions.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后，无界新闻网站停止更新并最终结束运营。
description.en: After the incident, the Wujie News website stopped updating and eventually ceased operations.

relationships.source: 阿里巴巴集团

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后，股东之一的阿里巴巴集团提出将无界传媒清盘。
description.en: After the incident, Alibaba Group, one of the shareholders, proposed to liquidate Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 因公开信事件，无界传媒董事长李万辉被警方扣押调查。
description.en: Due to the open letter incident, Wujie Media Chairman Li Wanhui was detained by police for investigation.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 因公开信事件，无界传媒执行总裁欧阳洪亮被警方扣押调查超过100天。
description.en: Due to the open letter incident, Wujie Media CEO Ouyang Hongliang was detained by police for investigation for over 100 days.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 因公开信事件，无界新闻执行主编黄志杰被警方扣押调查，后于5月初获释。
description.en: Due to the open letter incident, Wujie News Executive Editor Huang Zhijie was detained by police for investigation and was released in early May.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 因公开信事件，无界新闻副主编程圣中被警方扣押调查超过100天。
description.en: Due to the open letter incident, Wujie News Deputy Editor Cheng Shengzhong was detained by police for investigation for over 100 days.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 因被认为与公开信事件有关，贾葭于2016年3月15日被公安带走，被扣10日后获释。
description.en: Believed to be related to the open letter incident, Jia Jia was taken away by public security on March 15, 2016, and released after being detained for 10 days.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 温云超声称其在中国的家人因公开信事件而被捕。
description.en: Wen Yunchao claimed that his family in China was arrested because of the open letter incident.

relationships.source: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 长平声称其家人因他对此事件发表评论而被带走。
description.en: Chang Ping claimed his family was taken away because of his comments on this incident.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 要求习近平辞任总书记公开信事件

description.zh-cn: 2016年3月30日，中华人民共和国外交部就公开信事件作出回应，表示“任何企图破坏中国国家稳定的行为，都不可能得逞”。
description.en: On March 30, 2016, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China responded to the open letter incident, stating that 'any attempt to destabilize China is doomed to fail'.

relationships.source: 明镜新闻
relationships.target: 就立即罢免习近平同志党内外一切职务告全党、全军、全国人民书

description.zh-cn: 2016年3月底，明镜新闻网站刊登了《就立即罢免习近平同志党内外一切职务告全党、全军、全国人民书》。
description.en: In late March 2016, the Mirror News website published the 'Letter to the Entire Party, Army, and Nation on the Immediate Removal of Comrade Xi Jinping from All Posts Inside and Outside the Party'.

relationships.source: 就立即罢免习近平同志党内外一切职务告全党、全军、全国人民书

description.zh-cn: 该公开信以171名“忠诚的中国共产党员”名义，要求罢免习近平党内外一切职务。
description.en: This open letter, in the name of 171 'loyal Chinese Communist Party members', demanded the removal of Xi Jinping from all his positions both inside and outside the party.

relationships.source: 李万辉

description.zh-cn: 李万辉是无界传媒的董事长。
description.en: Li Wanhui was the Chairman of Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 欧阳洪亮

description.zh-cn: 欧阳洪亮是无界传媒的执行总裁。
description.en: Ouyang Hongliang was the CEO of Wujie Media.

relationships.source: 黄志杰

description.zh-cn: 黄志杰是无界新闻的执行主编。
description.en: Huang Zhijie was the Executive Editor of Wujie News.

relationships.source: 程圣中

description.zh-cn: 程圣中是无界新闻的副主编。
description.en: Cheng Shengzhong was the Deputy Editor of Wujie News.

relationships.source: 贾葭

position.en: Former Editor of the Commentary Section

description.zh-cn: 贾葭曾是《端传媒》传媒评论部的主编。
description.en: Jia Jia was formerly the editor of the commentary section at Initium Media.
